**Add static asset bundling & build pipeline**

Description
-----------
Introduce an asset bundler (webpack, Parcel, Vite, or Encore) to manage CSS and JS, produce production assets in `public`/`static`, and document build steps.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Add bundler config and npm scripts to build assets.
- Update project README with build and dev commands.
- Ensure production assets are referenced correctly by the app.

Labels: infra, frontend
Estimate: small
